page.title: 14Mrs Overton of Codford
page.content: Mrs Overton, who is well known in Codford,has lived all her life here.When she was a child she helped her father who worked on a farm.When she was three she started school at St.Peters.Later she went to St.Mary's and then to a school in Salisbury.When Mrs Overton left school she became a nurse.She presently works as a clerical assistant at Codford School where she has been for the past eleven years.She has seen many changes in her time.Where school is there used to be a field which her father owned.The main road is different because when Mrs Overton was a girl she could cross the road safely.Almost all of the council houses have been built since she was a girl.
